mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM GD_TR_RCRT GTR LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RCRT_IMG GTRI ON GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTRI.GD_TR_PST_ID JOIN CITIES C ON C.CITY_ID = GTR.TR_CT_ID JOIN COUNTRIES CTR ON C.COUNTRY_ID = CTR.COUNTRY_ID JOIN REGIONS R ON R.REGION_ID = CTR.REGION_ID JOIN USR_INF UI ON GTR.ATHR_ID = UI.USR_LGN_ID WHERE GTR.GD_TR_ST_DT > SYSDATE

SELECT G.GD_TR_PST_ID , G.GD_TR_TTL , G.ATHR_ID , TO_CHAR(G.GD_TR_ST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') GD_TR_ST_DT , TO_CHAR(G.GD_TR_ED_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') GD_TR_ED_DT , G.GD_TR_PRPS , G.GD_TR_MP , G.GD_TR_PRC , G.GD_TR_SMRY , G.GD_TR_MX_NP , G.TR_AVG_RTNG , GTI.GD_TR_IMG_URL , GR.ATHR_ID , GR.GD_TR_RVW_TTL , GR.GD_TR_RVW_CNTNT , GR.GD_TR_RVW_RTNG , GRI.GD_TR_RVW_IMG_URL , UI.USR_LNM , UI.USR_FNM , UI.USR_GNDR , UI.USR_SLF_INTDCTN , UI.USR_GD_EXP , C.COUNTRY_NAME , CT.CITY_NAME , TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TO_CHAR(UI.USR_BD , 'YYYYMMDD'))/ 12) AS guide_Age
FROM GD_TR_RCRT G LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RCRT_IMG GTI ON G.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTI.GD_TR_PST_ID LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RVW GR ON G.GD_TR_PST_ID = GR.GD_TR_PST_ID LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RVW_IMG GRI ON GR.GD_TR_RVW_ID = GRI.GD_TR_RVW_ID JOIN USR_INF UI ON G.ATHR_ID = UI.USR_LGN_ID JOIN CITIES CT ON G.TR_CT_ID = CT.CITY_ID JOIN COUNTRIES C ON CT.COUNTRY_ID = C.COUNTRY_ID WHERE G.GD_TR_PST_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT TR_DTL_LCT , TR_DTL_SCHD FROM TR_SCHD_INF WHERE GD_TR_PST_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID , GTR.ATHR_ID , GTR.USR_ID , GTR.GD_TR_TTL , TO_CHAR(GTR.GD_TR_ST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GD_TR_ST_DT , TO_CHAR(GTR.GD_TR_ED_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GD_TR_ED_DT , CEIL(GTR.GD_TR_ST_DT - SYSDATE) AS DEADLINE , GTR.GD_TR_PRPS , GTR.GD_TR_MP , GTR.GD_TR_PRC , GTR.GD_TR_SMRY , GTR.TR_CT_ID , GTR.GD_TR_MX_NP , GTRI.GD_TR_IMG_URL , C.CITY_NAME , CTR.COUNTRY_NAME , R.REGION_NAME , UI.USR_LNM , UI.USR_FNM , (SELECT AVG(GD_RVW_RTNG) FROM GD_RVW GR WHERE GR.GD_ID = GTR.ATHR_ID) AS AVG_GD_RVW , ( SELECT AVG(gtr2.GD_TR_RVW_RTNG) FROM GD_TR_RVW gtr2 WHERE gtr2.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID ) AS AVG_RVW FROM GD_TR_RCRT GTR LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RCRT_IMG GTRI ON GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTRI.GD_TR_PST_ID JOIN CITIES C ON C.CITY_ID = GTR.TR_CT_ID JOIN COUNTRIES CTR ON C.COUNTRY_ID = CTR.COUNTRY_ID JOIN REGIONS R ON R.REGION_ID = CTR.REGION_ID JOIN USR_INF UI ON GTR.ATHR_ID = UI.USR_LGN_ID WHERE GTR.GD_TR_ST_DT > SYSDATE

SELECT 'GT-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_GD_TR_RCRT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GD_TR_RCRT (GD_TR_PST_ID , ATHR_ID , USR_ID , GD_TR_TTL , GD_TR_ST_DT , GD_TR_PRPS , GD_TR_MP , GD_TR_PRC , GD_TR_SMRY , GD_TR_RSTR_DT , GD_TR_IS_DLT , TR_CT_ID , GD_TR_ED_DT , GD_TR_MX_NP , GD_TR_STTS) VALUES (#{gdTrPstId} , #{athrId} , NULL , #{gdTrTtl} , TO_DATE(#{gdTrStDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #{gdTrPrps} , #{gdTrMp} , #{gdTrPrc} , #{gdTrSmry} , SYSDATE , 'N' , #{trCtId} , TO_DATE(#{gdTrEdDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #{gdTrMxNp} , 'RCRTNG')
INSERT INTO TR_DTL (TR_DTL_ID , GD_TR_PST_ID , TR_DTL_INF) VALUES ('DI-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_TR_DTL_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{gdTrPstId} , #{trDtlInf})

INSERT INTO TR_SCHD_INF (TR_ADD_INF_ID , GD_TR_PST_ID , TR_DTL_LCT , TR_DTL_SCHD) VALUES ('AI-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_TR_SCHDL_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{gdTrPstId} , #{trDtlLct} , #{trDtlSchd})
INSERT INTO TOUR_INCLD (TR_INCLD_ID , TR_INCLD , GD_TR_PST_ID) VALUES ('TI-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_TOUR_INCLD_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{trIncld} , #{gdTrPstId})
